name: Towelket One more time 2: Karaage Tanpopo
name_original: Towelket One more time 2: Karaage Tanpopo
description:
Towelket One More Time 2: Karaage Tanpopo (タオルケットをもう一度２（唐揚げタンポポ）is a free Earthbound inspired JRPG made by Kanao (Kanashimi Hocchikisu) in the year of 2008.

Synopsys:
This is a story of a shy young boy and a pretty girl from a remote backwater village. They were destined to be together when a sudden alien invasion on Earth changes their lives, separating them from each other. Can their love withstand the ordeal? Will they be able to reunite, foiling the evil plans of the otherworldly villains?

Important: this game wasn't made by us (Patchy Illusion Team)! The developer allowed the games translation, however.

Warnings:
Despite its cute and pixelized appearance, Towelket 2 has been considered as one of the gloomiest titles in the series and has been rated R-15 in Japan.
The game contains: drugs and alcohol abuse, mentions of sex and rape, violence, blood, gore, bodyhorror and depressive tones.
